nodes.text: The Imperial Penal References, or ImPeRe, were a set of Imperial infractions for spacers and smugglers. There were five classes of ImPeRe infractions, ranking from Class Five to Class One in severity, though differences in enforcement by customs officials meant the infractions could be unevenly applied. They also had a subsection detailing infractions related to droids, known as the Droid Statutes.
